item.title: Karl Llewellyn appointed Head of Sales for LouderVoice
item.description: Those of you who have followed LouderVoice over the past few years have probably noticed that things have changed a lot in the last few months. All of those changes have been for the better and much of it is due to Karl Llewellyn, our new Head of Sales. Karl is responsible for driving our new partner strategy and recruiting web professionals as partners so they can offer LouderVoice to their customers.
